title: Liv Committed: Caroline Washam “Trails of Life”
content:
This is not your typical mountain bike movie, but it’s a topic that a lot of parents can relate to. Maybe not in the terms of a professional downhiller, but the uncertainties that come with balancing parenthood with life as a mountain biker.

From Liv Cycling USA: As a self-diagnosed “adrenaline junkie” whose identity was tied to downhill mountain biking & competition, Caroline Washam’s relationship with the sport she loves was redefined when she became pregnant. From learning to ride for pure enjoyment rather than competition to bringing her newborn along on adventures, Caroline embraces motherhood while refusing to give up her passion.

The post Liv Committed: Caroline Washam “Trails of Life” appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
